Welcome to Sperobox’s documentation!¶

This is the official documentation of Sperobox Software Engineering team.

Sperobox is a product made by INESC Coimbra using a lot of different techonologies. This project is somehow a social network with social responsability in mind.

This documentation is not intended for persons who don’t know how to code or don’t have a Computer Science background. Most of it’s content, covers engineering methodologies and practices, that were followed during the project conception.

It will be in a private repository, in which every team member should make their contributions in order to improve it. All tech and contribution aspects are available in the table of contents below.

Contents:

  • Overview
    • Physical Production Stack
    • Technologies
    • Deployment
    • Installation and Contribution
  • Arquitecture
    • Core Structure
    • Frontend
